### *Education*  

I attended [Hutton Grammar School](https://www.huttongrammar.org/) from the ages of 11-18. During his time at the school, I achieved a number of accolades including becoming Head Boy, and receiving the Head Teacher's Award. I then attended UCL where I read Economics and gained a first class honours degree. I am now pursuing an MFA at London Business School.
